reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects and uses personal information for various purposes.
reply.reference: FKA Brands collects and uses your personal information to give you superior customer service, to provide you with convenient access to our products and services, and to make a wider range available to you. URL: https://www.fkabrands.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app declares the collection of the following data types: Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Postal Address, Payment Information.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the explicit mention of the types of data collected in the privacy policy for the app.
reply.reference: Personal data shared with third-parties includes: - Name - Email Address - Phone Number - Postal Address - Payment Information. FKA Brands will always ask for your consent before sharing your Personal Information with a Third Party for purposes other than those described in this section. URL: https://www.fkabrands.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use. The app collects personal information to provide customer service, access to products, keep users informed about products, offers, and promotions, conduct market research surveys, and process online purchases.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that personal information is collected for specific purposes related to customer service, product access, notifications, market research, and online purchases.
reply.reference: Brands collects and uses your personal information to give you superior customer service, to provide you with convenient access to our products and services, and to make a wider range available to you. In addition, we use your personal information to keep you up to date on the latest product announcements, promotions, special offers, and other information we think you'd like to hear about. From time to time, we may also use your personal information to contact you to participate in a market research survey, so that we can gauge customer satisfaction and develop better products. Moreover, we may collect your billing and shipping information for processing an online purchase. URL: https://www.fkabrands.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data. Users have the right to access, amend, correct, and review their personal information held by FKA Brands. They can also withdraw their consent for data collection, use, or disclosure by contacting FKA Brands.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users have the right to access, amend, correct, and review their personal information. Additionally, users can withdraw their consent for data collection, use, or disclosure by contacting FKA Brands directly.
reply.reference: You retain all rights to your Personal Information and can access, amend, and correct it anytime. If you would like to review personal information that FKA Brands may have about you, email us at privacy@fkabrands.com. How to withdraw your consent: If after you opt-in, you change your mind, you may withdraw your consent for us to contact you, for the continued collection, use or disclosure of your information, at any time, by contacting us at privacy@fkabrands.com or mailing us at: FKA Brands Privacy Department 3000 N. Pontiac Trail Commerce Township, MI 48390. URL: https://www.fkabrands.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares personal data such as name, email address, phone number, postal address, and payment information with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that personal data including name, email address, phone number, postal address, and payment information is shared with third parties under specific circumstances.
reply.reference: Personal data shared with third-parties includes: - Name - Email Address - Phone Number - Postal Address - Payment Information. FKA Brands will always ask for your consent before sharing your Personal Information with a Third Party for purposes other than those described in this section. URL: https://www.fkabrands.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with other FKA Brands business units, shipping companies for delivery purposes, companies that help provide products and services, and third parties as required by law or legal process.

content: Third parties as required by law or legal process

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that personal information may be shared with various entities including other business units within FKA Brands, shipping companies, companies providing products and services, and third parties as mandated by law or legal processes.
reply.reference: Personal data shared with third-parties includes: - Name - Email Address - Phone Number - Postal Address - Payment Information. FKA Brands also works with other companies that help us provide products and services to you, and we may provide your personal information to these companies. For example, we give shipping companies this information so they can deliver your refills or replacement products efficiently. The information they receive is for shipping and delivery purposes only. URL: https://www.fkabrands.com/privacy-policy
